name: @chorus-one/signer-keplr
description: Keplr signer for the Chorus One SDK, used for signing Cosmos transactions

scripts.build: rm -fr dist/* && tsc -p tsconfig.mjs.json --outDir dist/mjs && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json --outDir dist/cjs && bash ../../scripts/fix-package-json

author: Chorus One AG
